SELECT ADMINIST_ZONE_SE , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE , ADMINIST_ZONE_NM , UPPER_ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE , CREAT_DE , ABL_DE , USE_AT FROM COMTCADMINISTCODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND ADMINIST_ZONE_SE = '1' AND ADMINIST_ZONE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ADMINIST_ZONE_SE = '2' AND ADMINIST_ZONE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTCADMINISTCODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND ADMINIST_ZONE_SE = '1' AND ADMINIST_ZONE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ADMINIST_ZONE_SE = '2' AND ADMINIST_ZONE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
